title: Buckwheat tabbouleh
ingredients: ['170g uncooked buckwheat', '1 large bunch parsley, finely chopped', '1 large bunch mint, finely chopped', '1 large red onion, finely chopped', '2 Lebanese cucumbers, diced', '2 to 3 vine-ripened tomatoes, diced', '2 lemons, juiced', '1 apple, peeled and chopped into chunks', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste']
